channel.title: CVE Feed for Sizam -- REHub Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sizam -- REHub Framework

item.title: CVE-2024-31234|2024-08-02T01:46:04.983Z -- sizam -- rehub%20framework
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Sizam REHub Framework.This issue affects REHub Framework: from n/a before 19.6.2.
